the_warlord:BleedPower.NAME: Bleed
DESCRIPTIONS: When Bleed is removed, loses #b%1$s HP.

the_warlord:GushPower.NAME: Gush
DESCRIPTIONS: Double enemy's #yBleed whenever it takes #yAttack #yDamage. At the start of its turn, loses #yGush and #yBleed.

the_warlord:ReactionTimePower.NAME: Reaction Time
DESCRIPTIONS: Allows #yParrying attacks that are within #b%1$s of your current block. Reduced by #b1 at the start of your turn.

the_warlord:SupportingFirePower.NAME: Supporting Fire
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, deal #b%1$s damage to ALL enemies. This damage is increased by your #yStrength.

the_warlord:NextTurnSyrettePower.NAME: Stimulus
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a Syrette to your hand at the start of next turn
Add a Syrette to your hand at the start of next #b%1$s turns.
